result.eng: We'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ga: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.orig: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gá
result.html: Dúnfaidh muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.
result.ponchtml: Dúnfaiḋ muid an siopa más gáWe'll close the shop if necessary.

result.eng: It is necessary to be really careful.
result.html: Is gá a bheith fíorchúramachIt is necessary to be really careful.
result.ponchtml: Is gá a ḃeiṫ fíorċúramaċIt is necessary to be really careful.

result.eng: It is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.html: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.ponchtml: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
